messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph:At about 12:31am, Investigator Lewis, with the assistance of Chauffer Rodney Robinson rolled the decedent over and placed her in a body bag. When the decedent was moved, investigators observed a single spent casing in the pool of blood where the decedent had been laying. Technician Muhammad photographed and collected the spent casing, which was identified as a

9mm Luger at 12:31am. Sergeant McMullen advised Detective Morton there was a blood trail from the interior hallway were the victim is located to North Derbignay Street. Detective Morton observed the H-10983-09 PAGE 16 At that point the witness observed her sister unresponsive and bleeding on the floor at the entrance to the bedroom. Gordon stated he would kill the witness if the police arrived while he was inside the residence. Both perpetrators then exited the residence with n money, or car keys. The witness notified then police.At 2:30AM Crime Lab Technician Tamika Rogers, Unit 5137, conducted gunshot residue test on both Darceleen Commodore and Earlitta Taylor at the Homicide Office. Coroner's Office Day Records from Detective David Trehan. The documents officially classified the shooting deaths of Patrice Commodore and Jessie Bibbins as a Homicides.Unit 520Manned By Detective Sergeant Chris RobertUnit 1570Manned By Officer Juan LopezUnit 507.. Manned By Officers Phil Burras & Quincy BroadenUnit 516..Manned By Officers Nate Addison & Glen HewittUnit 546.Manned By Detective Gregory JohnsonUnit 1532Unit 1571... Manned By Detective Jason McGeeManned By Detective Ananie MitchellUnit 1574Manned By Detective Melvin McCullumUnit 1576.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Investigator LewisOfficer Context: Assisted in rolling the decedent over and placing her in a body bag.Officer Role: InvestigatorOfficer Name: Chauffer Rodney RobinsonOfficer Context: Assisted Investigator Lewis with handling the decedentâ€™s body.Officer Role: ChaufferOfficer Name: Technician MuhammadOfficer Context: Photographed and collected a spent casing identified as a 'Win' 9mm Luger.Officer Role: TechnicianOfficer Name: Sergeant McMullenOfficer Context: Advised Detective Morton of a blood trail leading from the crime scene.Officer Role: SergeantOfficer Name: Detective MortonOfficer Context: Informed by Sergeant McMullen about the blood trail and conducted an on-scene investigation.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Crime Lab Technician Tamika RogersOfficer Context: Conducted gunshot residue tests on Darceleen Commodore and Earlitta Taylor at the Homicide Office.Officer Role: Crime Lab TechnicianOfficer Name: Detective David TrehanOfficer Context: Coroner's Office Day Records classified the deaths as homicides.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Sergeant Chris RobertOfficer Context: Associated with Unit 520.Officer Role: Detective SergeantOfficer Name: Officer Juan LopezOfficer Context: Associated with Unit 1570.Officer Role: OfficerOfficer Name: Officers Phil Burras & Quincy BroadenOfficer Context: Associated with Unit 507.Officer Role: OfficersOfficer Name: Officers Nate Addison & Glen HewittOfficer Context: Associated with Unit 516.Officer Role: OfficersOfficer Name: Detective Gregory JohnsonOfficer Context: Associated with Unit 546.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Jason McGeeOfficer Context: Associated with Unit 1571.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Ananie MitchellOfficer Context: Associated with Unit 1571.Officer Role: DetectiveOfficer Name: Detective Melvin McCullumOfficer Context: Associated with Unit 1574.Officer Role: Detective
